flawed_nl_solution:
After giving away 4/5 of the cupcakes, Anna has 60 / 5 = <<60/5=21>>21 cupcakes
After eating 3 cupcakes, Anna has 21 - 3 = <<21-3=18>>18 cupcakes.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
